/* eslint-disable no-unused-vars */ /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/no-redundant-roles */ /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import { useCart } from 'react-use-cart'; const Cart = () => { const { cart, removeFromCart } = useContext(CartContext); const { items = [] } = cart; return (
    {items.map((item, index) => (

  • {item.name}

    {item.price}

    Qty {item.quantity}

    • ))}
المبلغ الاجمالي {" "} {cartTotal}

Shipping and taxes calculated at checkout.

إنتقل للتوصيل والدفع
) } export default Cart
